enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Delegates discussed the Co-Chairs` draft conclusions.
SAUDI ARABIA, for the G-77/China, requested adding reference to adverse effects of the implementation of P&Ms.
The EU, supported by the US, proposed direct wording from decision 13/CP.7 (P&Ms).
The G-77/CHINA, with JAPAN and CANADA, welcomed the EU`s proposal, but requested it in writing.
Co-Chair Tony Surridge said the Co-Chairs would prepare draft conclusions incorporating the proposals to be discussed informally.
